Welcome to the "RSS RPG GAME"

Player control
Go forward: ↑ key.
Go back: ↓ key.
Go left: ← key.
Go right: → key.
Archery: spacebar key.
Enemy behavior.
Orcs are friendly creatures and will not fight you first.
But if you kill at least one orc, the rest will start following you to kill.
Game quest.
You can take the quest to kill the orcs from a beautiful elf.
Kill orcs Quest
Have some free time? Kill 10 the orcs and you can get out of here.

Congratulations! You've reached a new level!

This level is a maze
You need to find a golden chest full of wealth to complete the game!
